DFin/Neural-Network-Visualisation

Visualises neural network activations in 3D

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Visualizes neural network architectures from code
  • tool for visualizing and tracing circuits in neural networks
  • procedural 3D scene generator for computer vision and AI training
  • VGGT is a neural network that predicts 3D scene attributes like camera parameters, depth, and point maps from images
  • ML algorithms from scratch in Jupyter Notebooks with visualizations
  • Scans a network and generates an interactive topology visualization
  • Visualizes and explores 3D models in a browser
  • Unified model for photogrammetry subtasks
